message: I just renamed *.haml to *.erb and it seems to be working well when I use mm-server. But when I run mm-build it doesn't generate the HTML files, only the CSS, JS, images, etc.... am I missing something? I tried to rename the files to .html.erb but it didn't work either, sinatra couldn't render the pages...
Renaming index.html.haml to index.html.erb should "just work." You'll need to use ERb for the layout as well by renaming layout.haml to layout.erb.
Done! The issue was the layout.erb file. When I renamed it I appended the .html.erb extension also and it only needs the .erb. Thanks for the quick response!
